FuncDef: This command specifies the max size of encapsulated tunnel packet for the ipsec-tunnel/ip-tunnel or the dynamic tunnels terminated on the ipsec-gw. If the encapsulated v4 or v6 tunnel packet exceeds theencapsulated-ip-mtu, then system fragments the packet against the encapsulated-ip-mtu.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the max size in octets. Values-512 to 9000.
